frqParts.text: Write the response to each part of the question in complete sentences. Use appropriate psychological terminology. Using the sources provided, develop and justify an argument about the age at which parents should first allow their children to be exposed to media screens. A. Propose a specific and defensible claim based in psychological science that responds to the question.

B. (i) Support your claim using at least one piece of specific and relevant evidence from one of the sources. (ii) Explain how the evidence from part B (i) supports your claim using a psychological perspective, theory, concept, or research finding learned in AP Psychology.

C. (i) Support your claim using an additional piece of specific and relevant evidence from a different source than the one that was used in part B (i). (ii) Explain how the evidence from part C (i) supports your claim using a different psychological perspective, theory, concept, or research finding learned in AP Psychology than the one that was used in part B (ii).
